title: [有音乐]无聊来发个作业~~
txt_content:
本帖最后由 01186 于 2014-2-27 20:40 编辑 

闲着无聊就吧我刚做的作业给发一下~~
这是写我在以后(几天后)论文要写什么,
题目是个人电脑改变了世界什么~~还不算难~~


Personal Computer: ▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇(还没想好)
Introduction-- The personal computer has revolutionized modernsociety in many ways.
I. Business and industryA. Store large amounts of dataB. Inventory controlC. AccountingD. Control automated manufacturing
II. CommunicationA. Global networking B. EmailC. Video conferencing D. Social networking
III. EducationA. Resource information from internet B. Word processing, spread sheetC. PresentationD. Collaboration project
IV. EntertainmentA.  YouTubeB.  iTuneC.  Movie streamingD.  SteamE.  OriginF.  GameStop


Conclusion--Modern society has benefited and change  in many ways all because of the personalcomputer.


话说谁有MikuMikuDance Yellow的伴奏啊,能给我吗~~谢谢啦~~
